head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHANE, JOHN F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHANE, JOHN F.

block.p: COHANE-John F., of Pompano Beach, FL formerly of Westchester County on June 6, 2000. Dear husband of Veronica. Beloved father of John R. Cohane, Brian and Christopher Dalton and Regina Fink. Loving grandfather of Rob and Chris Cohane, Kelly Dalton and Billy Fink. Calling hours at The Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville, Between the hours of 7-9 p.m. Thursday 2-4 and 7-9 p.m. Friday. Mass of Christian Burial St. Joseph's Church Bronxville, NY on Saturday June 10 at 10a.m. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
